__NOTOC__ bool '''CheckFont''' (str ''fontname'');
== Usage == Checks to see if the [[font]] passed to it is a valid font or not. Any type of font or graphic usable by [[SetFont]] will be considered valid here as well.
== Parameters == *''fontname'': The name of the font to check.
==Return Value== Returns the true if the font is valid, otherwise it returns false.
==Example==
{{noexamples}}
